Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Athena

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerWithGroundEffect
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Athena
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Athena
extends PlayerWithGroundEffect
Class describes the power of Athena is described in this class. if player owns the Athena, if s/he moved up any of her/his workers, on opponent's turn opponent can NOT move up, it is carried out through an abstract class that is extended
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean makeMovement​(Coordinate destination)
    Method is overridden to activate the ground effect if player moved UP
    boolean makePower​(Coordinate destination)
    Method throws exception according to the power of Athena when opponent tries to move up
    boolean makeSelection​(Coordinate selection)
    Method is overridden to keep info from where player moved
    boolean respectEffect​(Coordinate from, Coordinate destination)
    The method defines that if Athena moved up, opponent should respect her power
